def is_remote_control_found():
    # Function to check if there is any remote control observed in the scene
    symbol is_found=exists remote: item : is_remote_control(remote) and visited(remote)
    return is_found

behavior __goal__():

            bind remote: item where:

                    observe(remote, "Check if it is the TV remote control")
